remarks: The double opposite category has the same composition as the original category.  Intended for use with property lemmas such as ~ monpropd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcbas.1 $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
2oppccomf $p |- ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) $.
